EmailTemplate.subject: 20%? 30%? 50%? Calculate how much you can save with Passive Optical LAN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Switch to Passive Optical LAN to cut costs and boost performance When considering an investment in your LAN, it’s important to get the business case right. Nokia has made this easy for you with our LAN Savings Calculator.
Input some basic information about your organization’s LAN requirements – floors, end-points and cabling – and we’ll show you how much you could save with Passive Optical LAN compared to a traditional Ethernet-over-copper LAN. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
